"'Control'" is a song by rock band Mutemath. It is the second radio single from
their self-titled debut album. The single was released to radio on January 15,
2008. A digital single followed sometime in February 2008.  The song
was written by Paul Meany, Adam LaClave, and Darren King and was originally
released on [[Reset (Mutemath EP)|Reset EP]] in 2004 and charted well on Radio &
Records CCR charts before their merger with [[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]].
The song also won a Dove Award in 2005 for Best Modern Rock Song of the
Year.  despite the fact the band were never intended to be marketed
in the CCM genre.
